content: What's the mono font used in mathematics_in_lean? We are writing a latex document for teaching, however we found some unicode can not be rendered in pdf. We are using the fontspec package and set mono font to be Noto Sans Mono. It covers most of the symbol but not the \quot. I wonder what should we do to include all the unicode in Lean?
Recently I switched to using JuliaMono for lean code in LaTeX
Yicheng Tao has marked this topic as resolved.
